hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: test_spec
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
# Check anonymous http links ["http://www.dennyzhang.com/", "https://www.dennyzhang.com/", "http://brain.dennyzhang.com/", "http://slack.dennyzhang.com/", ].each do |url| describe command('curl -I --connect-timeout 10 -k %s 2>&1' %[url]) do its(:stdout) { should match /HTTP\/1.1 200 OK/ } end end
describe service('jenkins') do it { should be_running } end
# ping check ["www.github.com"].each do |item| describe command("ping -c3 #{item}") do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end end
# Check remote tcp port ["vpn.dennyzhang.com:6188", # vpn "www.dennyzhang.com:443", # ssl ].each do |ip_port| (ip, port) = ip_port.split(':') describe command("nc -z -v -w5 #{ip} #{port} 2>&1") do its(:stdout) { should match /open/ } end end
# Check at least 2 GB free memory describe command("[ `free -ml | grep 'buffers/cache' | awk -F' ' '{print $4}'` -gt 2048 ]") do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end
# check cpu loadavg in latest one min ["172.17.0.1:2702:10"].each do |item| (ip, port, cpu_load) = item.split(':') command_str = "[ `ssh -o stricthostkeychecking=no -i /var/jenkins_home/.ssh/docker_host_id_rsa -p %s root@%s cat /proc/loadavg | awk '{print int($1+0.99)}'` -lt %s ]" \ % [port, ip, cpu_load] describe command(command_str) do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end end
# check docker container number ["172.17.0.1:2702:15"].each do |item| (ip, port, container_count) = item.split(':') command_str = "[ `ssh -o stricthostkeychecking=no -i /var/jenkins_home/.ssh/docker_host_id_rsa -p %s root@%s docker ps | sed 1d | wc -l` -lt %s ]" \ % [port, ip, container_count] describe command(command_str) do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end end
